name: Spherum 3D
summary: Spherum Metaverse is a Next-Gen Web3 Metaverse with Volumetric avatars. By combining the best of both VR and the Volumetric technology, Spherum enables new ways of communication and interaction. Spherum users can walk and explore a new three-dimensional world, view and interact with new content appearing on the platform, and explore new features of Volumetric video.
